mapper.select: SELECT r.res_id, r.res_name, r.res_code, r.res_url, r.res_channel, r.remark, r.is_enabled FROM sys_role_resource rr LEFT JOIN sys_resource r ON rr.res_id = r.res_id WHERE rr.role_id = #{role_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND r.is_deleted = 0

SELECT mu.menu_id, mu.menu_name, mu.menu_pid, mu.menu_icon, mu.menu_level, mu.menu_sort, mu.menu_url, mu.create_time, mu.create_user, mu.modify_user, mu.modify_user, mu.remark, mu.is_enabled, mu.is_deleted FROM ybt_user u LEFT JOIN ybt_manager m ON u.user_id = m.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu mu ON mu.menu_id = rm.menu_id WHERE u.user_id = #{user_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND mu.is_deleted == 0 AND mu.is_enabled == 1
